dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Dan Crean
dmca.body:
Feb 2, 2007
3532 Bee Caves Rd., No. 100
Austin, TX 78746

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger, DMCA complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043
(650) 618-1499, Attn: Blogger, DMCA complaints


Sir/Madam:

I write about some blogspot blogs that have copied material from my client's site. I sent this letter on December 27, 2006, but you apparently did not get it because these sites are still up.


http://mesothelioma133.blogspot.com/2006/10/mesothelioma-diagnesis-info.html

is a copy of
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm


http://curemesotheliomadisease.blogspot.com/2006/06/mesothelioma-symptoms.html

is a copy of
http://www.meotheliomaweb.org/symptoms.htm


http://mesothelaoma-jasmin.blogspot.com/2006/11/mesothelioma.html
is a copy of
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/index.htm

http://wawan.smilejogja.com/mesothelioma/?p=51
is a copy of
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.html

http://mesooth.blogspot.com/
is a copy of
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/mesothelioma.html
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/treat.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/nutrition.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/pain.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/newapproaches.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/findspc.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/cancercenters.htm
and some other pages

http://mesothelioma-care.blogspot.com/2006/01/mesothelioma-stages.html
copies from
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm

http://related-mesotheliomaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm

http://related-mesothelioma.blogspot.com/
is a copy of
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/cause.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/diagnosis.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/doctor-patient.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/treat.htm
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/choosedoctor.htm
and http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/team.htm

http://www.coolfun-mesotheliomasymptoms.blogspot.com/
is a copy of
http://www.mesotheliomaweb.org/symptoms.htm


3. My name is Dan Crean. My e-mail address is dan@spurdigital.com

4. According to the registrar whois.markmonitor.com, the contact information for this site is:

Google Inc.
(DOM-345046)
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View
CA
94043 US

Domain Name: blogspot.com

Administrative Contact:
DNS Admin
(NIC-1467103)
Google Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View
CA
94043 US
dns-admin@google.com +1.6502530000 Fax- +1.6506188571

I cannot identify the individual bloggers who made the offending posts.


5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.


6. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Sincerely,

Daniel Crean
